meanings: announcement, declaration, proclamation, pronouncement, announce, declare, proclaim, pronounce

examples.korean: to announce/declare/withdraw your candidacy for the post 발음듣기 그 직책에 출마를 발표하다/선언하다/철회하다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: The new theatre was inaugurated by the mayor. 발음듣기 그 새 극장은 시장이 개관을 선언했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The new theatre was inaugurated by the mayor. 발음

examples.korean: The declaration proclaimed the full sovereignty of the republic. 발음듣기 그 선언서는 그 공화국의 완전한 자주를 선언했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The declaration proclaimed the full sovereignty of the republic. 발음

examples.korean: The treaty was declared invalid because it had not been ratified. 발음듣기 그 조약은 비준을 받지 않았으므로 무효라고 선언되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The treaty was declared invalid because it had not been ratified. 발음
